alert.note: Alert for Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 11:19AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Dewey County through 1145 AM MDT... At 1119 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lantry, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lantry and Bear Creek around 1125 AM MDT. Eagle Butte and South Eagle Butte around 1135 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Green Grass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
